page.title: 16Swimming Gala.
page.content: Everyone is excited because today is our {Swimming Gala}.We will be racing against other children with the same colour braids.To get a braid you have to be able to do certain things like{ {crawl,backstroke,diving for a brick} and{underwater swimming }.We come to school with our costumes on under our uniform so that we will be ready quickly .Everyone sits along the side of the pool in their braid group.The teacher calls the first race we line up feeling very nervous.Usually someone starts before they should and we have to start again.Ready, steady, go and we are off the water splashes it seems a long way everyone is cheering for their friend it is very noisy and very exciting.
